name: Raatihuone
description: Raatihuone is a virtual reality experience where you travel through the history of Kajaani city hall and solve interesting puzzles.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 Storage: 4 GB available space
